bridge-type.label: JADE agent container
bridge-type.description: The Agent container represents the infrastructure to run an agent in.

parameter.name: localMTPAddress
parameter.label: Local MTP Address
parameter.description: The local host interface (IP address/hostname) where the JADE MTP should bind/listen to. (e.g. 132.252.61.116)

parameter.name: remoteMTPAddress
parameter.label: MTP Address
parameter.description: The address of the JADE MTP (message transport protocol), where the GroupCoordinator agent is available. (e.g. 132.252.61.126)

parameter.name: remoteMTPPort
parameter.label: MTP Port
parameter.description: The port of the JADE MTP (message transport protocol), where the GroupCoordinator agent is available. (e.g. 7778)

parameter.name: remoteMTPProtocol
parameter.label: MTP Protocol
parameter.description: The used protocol of the JADE MTP (message transport protocol). (e.g. HTTP/HTTPS)

parameter.name: remotePlatformName
parameter.label: Platform Name
parameter.description: The name of the JADE platform, where the GroupCoordinator agent is available. (e.g. 132.252.61.126:1099/JADE)

parameter.name: remoteGroupCoordinatorName
parameter.label: GroupCoordinator Agent Name
parameter.description: The name of the GroupCoordinator. (e.g. CeExAg)
